template.name: Template App Apache2 Active custom
template.description: Get metrics from mod_status module using Zabbix agent. Heavily modified from https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_status.html

item.name: Apache Workers - Details - Open slot with no current process
Apache Workers - Details - Waiting for Connection

resource.name: Apache2 Bytes and Requests per second

trigger.name: Apache on {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted

trigger.expression: {Template App Apache2 Active custom:web.page.get[{$STUB_STATUS_HOST},{$STUB_STATUS_PATH},{$STUB_STATUS_PORT}].str("HTTP/1.1 200")}=0 or {Template App Apache2 Active custom:web.page.get[{$STUB_STATUS_HOST},{$STUB_STATUS_PATH},{$STUB_STATUS_PORT}].nodata(30m)}=1
trigger.name: Failed to fetch apache2 server status page

trigger.expression: {Template App Apache2 Active custom:apache2_workers_Busy.last()}> {Template App Apache2 Active custom:apache2_scoreboard_Total.last()}*0.90
trigger.name: More than 90% worker are busy on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Apache2 Active custom:apache2_workers_Busy.last()}> {Template App Apache2 Active custom:apache2_scoreboard_Total.last()}*0.95
trigger.name: More than 95% worker are busy on {HOST.NAME}

graph.name: Apache2 Bytes and Requests per second
